name: MPPlayableContentDelegate
desc: The protocol used to let external media players send playback commands to an app.

items.name: func playableContentManager(MPPlayableContentManager, initiatePlaybackOfContentItemAt: IndexPath, completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Asks the delegate to begin playback of the specified content item.

items.name: func playableContentManager(MPPlayableContentManager, initializePlaybackQueueWithContentItems: [Any]?, completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Asks the delegate to prepare suggested content for playback.

items.name: func playableContentManager(MPPlayableContentManager, initializePlaybackQueueWithCompletionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Asks the delegate to prepare suggested content for playback.

items.name: func playableContentManager(MPPlayableContentManager, didUpdate: MPPlayableContentManagerContext)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate that the playable content managerâ€™s context information has changed.
